text: Arrā wa ningen no (gense ni okeru heian no) tame, seinaru ie, kāba o tsukuri, mata Midzuki to sasagemono to (gisei ni sonaeru kachiku no) kubikazari o sadame rareta. Kore wa anata gata ni, arrā ga ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono o shitte ora re, katsu arrā ga subete no koto ni tsūgyō shite ora reru koto o, shiraseru tamedearu
